name: oOku (demo)
description:
down in your soul

within your deepest dream

exists a secret world

hidden in the flow of time

oOku is a point & click journey trough a nostalgic world

full of music, light and shadow

solve music- and time-based puzzles to unveil the mysterious knowledge also known as the tRuth.

solve even harder puzzles to obtain the tracks of this intriguing interactive music album.

like immortality oOku is not for everyone.

it is only for ambitious puzzlers and critical minds.

others can enjoy the music here.

headphones and chrome highly recommended
